meanings.sent1: She looked unrelaxed during the exam.
meanings.sent2: The unrelaxed cat kept pacing back and forth.
meanings.sent3: The unrelaxed squirrel couldn't decide which acorn to choose.
meanings.sent4: The unrelaxed storm clouds gathered ominously in the sky.
meanings.sent5: His unrelaxed hands trembled with nervous energy.

meanings.sent1: The unrelaxed rope held the weight securely.
meanings.sent2: Her unrelaxed grip on the steering wheel showed her tension.
meanings.sent3: The unrelaxed knot refused to come undone.
meanings.sent4: The unrelaxed fabric clung tightly to her skin.
meanings.sent5: The unrelaxed muscles strained under the heavy load.

meanings.definition: Not relieved from tension or stress.
meanings.sent1: He felt unrelaxed after the long day at work.
meanings.sent2: The unrelaxed atmosphere in the room made everyone uneasy.
meanings.sent3: The unrelaxed silence between them grew awkward.
meanings.sent4: Her unrelaxed expression revealed her inner turmoil.
meanings.sent5: The unrelaxed worry gnawed at his mind all night.
